solution_line_template: In five years, Angelina will be {angelina_future_age} years old, meaning currently she is {angelina_future_age}-{angelina_future_years} = <<{angelina_future_age}-{angelina_future_years}={angelina_current_age}>>{angelina_current_age} years old.

Since Angelina is {angelina_current_age} years old right now, and she is four years older than Justin, it means Justin is {angelina_current_age}-{angelina_older_by} = <<{angelina_current_age}-{angelina_older_by}={justin_current_age}>>{justin_current_age} years old.
